967060.name: Raffle Blast
967060.description:
Raffle Blast is a tool that provides a way for anyone to host and present a visually appealing raffle or drawing to any sized group.
No hat or coffee can needed :)

It can easily be used for Raffles, Drawings, Bingo, Baby/Bridal Bingo, 50/50 drawings, door prizes, holiday parties and much more. Your own themes can be created as needed with your own custom background, sounds and textures and it contains a myriad of shapes to choose from with more being added all the time.

The display supports resolutions ranging from 640X480 through 1920X1080.
